useCase.name: User Research Participant Selection
useCase.description: Use case for selecting potential NSF participants for interviews.

preconditions.precondition: System has access to the NSF Staff Database.

successEndConditions.condition: NSF participants are selected and confirm their RSVPs.

useCase.trigger: User Researcher searches for potential participants based on interview topic.

mainSequence.step: User Researcher searches for potential participants based on interview topic.
User Research Management System queries for staff with relevant expertise.
NSF Staff Database returns a list of potential NSF participants.
User Research Management System presents potential participants to User Researcher.
User Researcher selects NSF participants for interviews.
Email System sends invitation emails with interview details.
User Research Management System confirms the RSVPs of NSF participants.
